title: Miso-Cup Natural Instant Soup and Seasoning
generatedText: Thinking about having some soup today? Miso-Cup Natural Instant Soup and Seasoning is one option; let's take a closer look. One serving of this product provides 30 calories, 1g grams of fat, 3g grams of protein, and 3g grams of carbs. We recommend choosing products with short ingredient lists, as these tend to be less processed. This product has 4 ingredients. This product contains no ingredients that some research suggests you should avoid.

ingredients.name: spices
ingredients.description: "Spice" can refer to any number of spices. If you are allergic to a spice, you will need to call the manufacturer to find out which spices are included. Things like wheat and sugar have to be listed separately, so "spice" is safe for gluten free diets.

ingredientList: Soybeans, Cultured Rice, Sea Salt, Onions, Wakame Seaweed
